articles.author: Robert Z. Pearlman
articles.title: Russian cosmonaut becomes first to ride European robotic arm on ISS spacewalk - Space.com
articles.content:
A Russian cosmonaut completed the first test flight at the end of a robotic arm as part of a successful spacewalk at the International Space Station (ISS) on Wednesday (Aug. 9).

articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: ESA confirms Ariane 6 debut to slip to 2024 - SpaceNews
articles.description: The European Space Agency acknowledged Aug. 8 what most of the space industry had long expected: the first flight of the Ariane 6 will not happen this year.
articles.content:
LOGAN, Utah The European Space Agency acknowledged Aug. 8 what most of the space industry had long expected: the first flight of the Ariane 6 will not happen this year.
